thread.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Soundtrack Is Getting Reissued on Vinyl
thread.title_full: The ‘Stranger Things’ Soundtrack Is Getting Reissued on Vinyl

author: Stephanie Smith-Strickland
title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Soundtrack Is Getting Reissued on Vinyl
text:
Visit the original post to see all 2 images from this gallery. 
Despite being in its off season, Stranger Things fever is still in full swing. The latest to cash in on the world’s latest pop culture obsession is Lakeshore Records and Invada Records, who have teamed up to release a limited edition vinyl reissue of the Stranger Things soundtrack, along with a deluxe box set. The new editions feature colorful vinyls, a fold-out poster and updated, never-before-seen artwork.
Also included are liner notes with special insights from the Duffer brothers (the show’s creators), as well as the show’s soundtrack composers. Though Lakeshore is releasing the vinyls Stateside exclusively you can also purchase the set at global locations through Invada. Lakeshore will release their set in two volumes – the first volume will feature character cards of the show’s child main characters and the second will feature the show’s adult.
You can cop the new vinyl sets starting July 14.
Season two of Stranger Things premieres Halloween. In the meantime you can take a first look of the new season here .
